replies.author: 梓
replies.txt_content:
mangaddp builder plotme.use
mangaddp builder plotme.use.add
mangaddp builder plotme.use.remove

replies.author: 凯瑞
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder plotme.use
就行了，最好在地皮世界使用，因为有些服务器同一个组在不同世界的权限不同步。
(我的服务器就是这样的)

replies.author: Mccraft-pepsi
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder plotme.use复制代码/mangaddp builder plotme.add复制代码/mangaddp builder plotme.remove复制代码/mangaddp builder plotme.limit.1复制代码
四条缺一不可！ 最佳=v=
